column1: # SOURCE: Industry benchmarks for food warehousing in developing regions (Egypt/MENA)
# DESCRIPTION: Daily storage costs per kg by product type and storage condition
#   - storage_condition: ambient (25-35C shed/warehouse) or climate_controlled (2-8C cold storage)
#   - cost_per_kg_per_day_usd: Daily holding cost per kg including space
# LOGIC: Fresh requires cold chain or rapid turnover (highest cost). Shelf-stable products
